entry.title: $2300 // **Big, over-sized windows in bedrooms AND windows in every piece**
entry.content:
ID
21987

You want brick? You got it, lots of it. You want bright? Big, over-sized windows in bedrooms AND windows in every piece of common space. Bedrooms aren't large but living room is very big. PLUS a small but separate kitchen. New renovations. Hardwood floors. Exposed brick in every room. Third floor walk up. Roof access w/ Manhattan Skyline. Great location; in-between the DeKalb L & the Knickerbocker M. Near Maria Hernandez Park & lots of yummy places to eat. Heat & HW inc. April 1 starts

High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Exposed brick
Eat In Kitchen
Roof access
Outdoor Space
Granite countertops

Call or text to schedule a viewing! Thanks! : show contact info
